definition: to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)

sentences.english: What kind of government will bel behind for his successor?
sentences.chinese: 他將留給後任一個什麼樣的政府呢？

sentences.english: This, it appears, is the legacy I have received and have now bequeathed to my own child.
sentences.chinese: 而這，正是我已收到並留給自己孩子的遺產。

sentences.english: It is a paper that those gentlemen left for these ladies.
sentences.chinese: 這是那幾位先生留給太太們的一張條子。

sentences.english: The only option left with me was to ask her to go the airport for getting her ticket re-scheduled.
sentences.chinese: 留給我的唯一選項就是叫她去機場重新預訂機票。

sentences.english: I always stick to be virginity to present the man who I will live together throughout my life.
sentences.chinese: 總是守着着份貞操留給和自己一輩子的男人。

sentences.english: Mother's old-fashioned quartz watch was inherited from my grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 老式石英錶是姥姥留給她的。

sentences.english: Many others will be filled by “retired” army officers.
sentences.chinese: 另有許多席位留給了“退役的”軍職人員。

sentences.english: He's frittered away the money his father left him.
sentences.chinese: 他揮霍掉了父親留給他的錢財。

sentences.english: The majority of users are mine production dispatching users except a few administrative users.
sentences.chinese: 除少數行政用戶外外，大部分留給礦生產調度用戶。

sentences.english: Vargas emptied his tool bag and left the bag with the Indian.
sentences.chinese: 瓦格斯騰出自己的工具袋，把它留給印第安人。

sentences.english: In the meantime, I'll leave this info literature with you.
sentences.chinese: 那我現在就把這些書面資料留給你。

sentences.english: He left his Montana ranch to his spinster sister.
sentences.chinese: 他把他在蒙大拿州的大牧場留給了他未婚妹妹。

sentences.english: You are left with the holes in your sink and the supply tubes waiting for the new faucet.
sentences.chinese: 您留給在您的水槽和等待新的龍頭的供應管的孔。

sentences.english: Leaving Harry an old Snitch – what the hell was that about?
sentences.chinese: 留給哈利一箇舊的金色小賊，幹什麼用呀？

sentences.english: The seats are reserved for old and sick people.
sentences.chinese: 這些座位是留給老弱病殘。

sentences.english: She soon made off with the fortune which she had gained when his father died.
sentences.chinese: 她很快就把她父親死時留給她的遺產花光了。
